definitions.title: vb. draw out, off
definitions.body: (NH id., loosen, draw (nail, sword; Jastr); As. šalâpu, pluck out, draw sword; Aram. [[לְֵַף]] draw sword, draw off shoe, 4lap draw sword, in Lexx. remove corselet; Ar. salafa is pass, pass away, salaba strip, plunder, etc.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[שׁ]]: Ju Jdg 3:22 +; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּשְׁלֽף]] Ru 4:8, etc.; Imv. ms. [[שְׁלֽף]] Ju Jdg 9:54 +; Pt. act. [[שׁׂלֵף]] Jdg 8:10 +, etc.; pass. f. [[שׁלוּפָה]] Nu 22:23 +;—

draw out sword from ([[מִן]]) wound Ju Jdg 3:22, cf. Job 20:25; usu. sword from sheath Ju Jdg 8:20, Jdg 9:54, 1Sa 31:4 = 1Ch 10:4, + [[מִתַּעְרָהּ]] 1Sa 17:51; [[וְחַרְבּוֹ שָׁלוּפָה בְּיׇדוֹ]] Nu 22:23, Nu 22:31, Jos 5:13 (all J), 1Ch 21:16; elsewhere ´[[אִישׁ שׁׂלֵף ח]]: coll. Ju Jdg 8:10, Jdg 20:2, Jdg 20:15, Jdg 20:17, Jdg 20:46, 2Sa 24:9, 2Ki 3:26, 1Ch 21:5, 1Ch 21:5, cf. Ju Jdg 20:35 and (´[[שְׁלֽפֵי ח]]:) v:Jdg 20:25.
draw off sandal Ru 4:7, Ru 4:8 (cf. I. [[חלץ]]

shoot up (?), i.e. draw out blade, of grass on roof Ps 129:6 (cf. Ew Bae al.); Che Dr is unsheathed (vb. c. subj. indef. = pass.), with same meaning; Hup-Now prop. [[שָׁלֵם]] (with ‖ in Syr.); v. Ortenberg:Textkrit1 K d. Ps. (1861), 30 [[שֶׁחָלָף]], We:Hpt Du [[חֲלֽף]] (as Ps 90:5, Ps 90:6, v. ´[[ח]]:
